attributes.action: Sack Gordon Brown, He has lost the PUBLIC purse, BILLIONS of £'s,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
plans should be put in place to make back these funds. looking at all of the many ways the Deputy PM has lost the PUBLIC purse money i.e. selling of gold bullion stocks, going against Bank of England's stark predictions of the treasury losing money from the sale.

also....

why is it that the Deputy PM thinks he can crerate a Billion Pound deficit, mounting to a three figure sum, in the UK's Pension Fund.
People have been paying their money into  the pension fund for years, that money should NEVER be touched unless it comes to paying people THEIR pension back to them... Rant Over!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
